question: Which Union Ministry co-hosts the Grand Challenges Annual Meeting 2020?
option3: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Grand Challenges Annual Meeting 2020 will be co-hosted by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Department of Biotechnology, Ministry of Science & Technology, the Indian Council of Medical Research and NITI Aayog.
The Grand Challenges Canada, the US Agency for International Development and Wellcome are also engaged in the meeting. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will deliver the keynote address at the inaugural function, on October 19.
